issue.title: sports.yahoo.co.jp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://sports.yahoo.co.jp/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsports.yahoo.co.jp%2F) ### Comment > AdGuardがオンの時、モバイル版スポーツナビのトップの種目一覧が表示されなくなってしまいます。おそらくAdGuard日本語フィルタの > sports.yahoo.co.jp##.cm-modCommon02 > というルールが原因と思われます。このルールが追加された意図は不明ですが、削除を検討していただきますようお願いします。 ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mubec0e9z74s0osw8w8kgkkgo08cswg8j6ejdxf6fo.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/l7zswwnrdr4k4kkcsgccsc80gskw08k2f8jtmecv3o.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.2 System version: | iOS 17.3.1 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `Cloudflare`, `DNS`

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
